alert.note: Alert for Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 5:40PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Scotts Bluff County through 530 PM MDT... At 439 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Scotts Bluff National Monument, or near Scottsbluff, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Scotts Bluff National Monument around 450 PM MDT. Scottsbluff and Terrytown around 500 PM MDT. Gering around 515 PM MDT. Scottsbluff Airport around 530 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
